children.value: Elliptic curves with complex multiplication give rise to tori over the complex numbers

contains the paper, poster, images, and 3d modeling files from my research and learning project on elliptic curves. I completed this project with James
Duncan under the guidance of Cara Mullen (PhD) and Professor Alina Cojocaru (PhD).
Download Paper Download Poster
Our research focuses on elliptic curves
